content: I ran RUSTFLAGs=-Zself-profile on recent nightly and when I run measureme I get Error: "Could not find profiling data file regex-59411.mm_profdata`." Is there some other flag that needs to be passed in? I was following https://doc.rust-lang.org/beta/unstable-book/compiler-flags/self-profile.html

@Aman Arora You can use the workaround described here (https://github.com/rust-lang/measureme/issues/135#issuecomment-701314947) or if you just git pull the latest version of rust-lang/rust this should be resolved.
